thread.title: Music fan
thread.title_full: Ticketmaster Resale reviewed by Music fan

author: Music fan
title: Music fan
text: Tickets easily purchased and received by email. A little difficult to decipher seating/ticketing arrangements at the venue (Sydney Myer Music Bowl Melbourne) due to everyone using a different numbering system - needs to be standardised. I did get access to the front standing area like I was aiming for.
